def packValuator(self):
        # Position components
        if self._label:
            self._label.grid(row=0, column=0, sticky = tk.EW)
        self._entry.grid(row=0, column=1, sticky = tk.EW)
        self._valuator.grid(row=0, column=2, padx = 2, pady = 2)
        self.interior().columnconfigure(0, weight = 1)
